categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Cameron" was the nickname of a clone trooper who served under Captain Rex and General Anakin Skywalker.

Cameron boarded Aayla Secura's cruiser with Rex, Ahsoka Tano, and a small squad of clones during the Sky Battle of Quell and narrowly survived thanks to Skywalker. However, he would die later at the hands of a mastiff phalone on Maridun while trying to find the natives to heal General Skywalker. He was then thrown on top of Bly by the mastiff phalone, though, even with his death he succeeded in helping save Skywalker's life.
